title: Trump holds rally at assassination attempt site in Pennsylvania
content: Donald Trump returned to the Pennsylvania fairgrounds for a rally after surviving an assassination attempt in July. Accompanied by Elon Musk, who endorsed him, Trump addressed the crowd emphasizing the importance of his re-election. Enhanced security measures were in place, ensuring safety during the event.
summary: Donald Trump returned to the Pennsylvania fairgrounds for a rally after surviving an assassination attempt in July. Accompanied by Elon Musk, who endorsed him, Trump addressed the crowd emphasizing the importance of his re-election. Enhanced security measures were in place, ensuring safety during the event.

title: 'Shame on them': Netanyahu slams Macron for arms embargo amid escalating tension with Iran
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu condemned French President Emmanuel Macron's call for an arms embargo against Israel, describing it as a disgrace. Netanyahu emphasized that while Iran arms militant groups, Israel faces disarmament demands, framing the conflict as a battle against radical forces threatening global civilization.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu condemned French President Emmanuel Macron's call for an arms embargo against Israel, describing it as a disgrace. Netanyahu emphasized that while Iran arms militant groups, Israel faces disarmament demands, framing the conflict as a battle against radical forces threatening global civilization.

title: Real reason why Prince Harry spent his birthday night apart from Meghan
content: Meghan was last seen before Harry's birthday. The Duchess of Sussex reportedly booked the trip for Harry so that he could spend the night of his 40th birthday doing a hike on the Montecito peak -- which is part of the Cold Spring Trail in California. It is near Harry-Meghan's mansion.
summary: Meghan was last seen before Harry's birthday. The Duchess of Sussex reportedly booked the trip for Harry so that he could spend the night of his 40th birthday doing a hike on the Montecito peak -- which is part of the Cold Spring Trail in California. It is near Harry-Meghan's mansion.

title: Barron Trump was bullied for rumors that he has autism, reveals Melania
content: “Barron’s experience of being bullied both online and in real life following the incident is a clear indication of the irreparable damage caused,” Melania wrote, as quoted by the New York Times. “No apology can undo the harm inflicted upon him," she wrote making it clear that she's still furious at Ms O'Donnell.
summary: “Barron’s experience of being bullied both online and in real life following the incident is a clear indication of the irreparable damage caused,” Melania wrote, as quoted by the New York Times. “No apology can undo the harm inflicted upon him," she wrote making it clear that she's still furious at Ms O'Donnell.

title: 'WTF!' Kamala Harris slammed for 'Call Her Daddy' interview: 'This is her priority over Hurricane Helene'
content: Harris and her running mate Tim Walz have so far done a combined 24 interviews and Harris has not held a formal press conference since she replaced President Joe Biden as the Democrat nominee. 'Call Her Daddy' is the most-listened to podcast by women on Spotify and Kamala Harris will be speaking about abortion. Donald Trump and JD Vance gave 63 combined interviews in the same time frame, reports said.
summary: Harris and her running mate Tim Walz have so far done a combined 24 interviews and Harris has not held a formal press conference since she replaced President Joe Biden as the Democrat nominee. 'Call Her Daddy' is the most-listened to podcast by women on Spotify and Kamala Harris will be speaking about abortion. Donald Trump and JD Vance gave 63 combined interviews in the same time frame, reports said.

title: Green card for extraordinary abilities – will the updated guidelines make it easier for Indians especially those in STEM field?
content: Indian professionals in STEM fields are exploring the EB-1A visa for those with extraordinary abilities. Sandeep Singh Sandha, a UCLA doctorate now in machine learning, succeeded in obtaining this visa. The article discusses the criteria for qualification, recent updates from USCIS, and the importance of thorough preparation.
summary: Indian professionals in STEM fields are exploring the EB-1A visa for those with extraordinary abilities. Sandeep Singh Sandha, a UCLA doctorate now in machine learning, succeeded in obtaining this visa. The article discusses the criteria for qualification, recent updates from USCIS, and the importance of thorough preparation.

title: Diddy sex tapes: Attorney claims 3 A-list celebs involved in compromising situation
content: “The individuals who contacted me purported to have three different tapes with three different celebrities, including Diddy, and then a fourth celebrity without Diddy but in a compromising situation with someone,” attorney Ariel Mitchel-Kidd claimed on NewsNation. Mitchell said she can't attest whether these tapes exists or not. “I just was told initially that ‘they’ own this treasure trove of videos, so I have to believe that there are a lot of celebrities who know what they did ….”
summary: “The individuals who contacted me purported to have three different tapes with three different celebrities, including Diddy, and then a fourth celebrity without Diddy but in a compromising situation with someone,” attorney Ariel Mitchel-Kidd  claimed on NewsNation. Mitchell said she can't attest whether these tapes exists or not. “I just was told initially that ‘they’ own this treasure trove of videos, so I have to believe that there are a lot of celebrities who know what they did ….”

title: Elon Musk at Pennsylvania Trump rally today: Full list of guests
content: Donald Trump returns to Butler, Pennsylvania for the first time since the July assassination attempt, with numerous guests including Elon Musk, who has endorsed Trump. Increased security measures are in place for the rally as a number of guests will be present at the rally. Apart from Elon Musk, Trump's running mate, JD Vance, Trump's son Eric, daughter-in-law Mary Trump will be present. The family members of Corey Comperatore who lost his life during the assassination attempt will also be present.
summary: Donald Trump returns to Butler, Pennsylvania for the first time since the July assassination attempt, with numerous guests including Elon Musk, who has endorsed Trump. Increased security measures are in place for the rally as a number of guests will be present at the rally. Apart from Elon Musk, Trump's running mate, JD Vance, Trump's son Eric, daughter-in-law Mary Trump will be present. The family members of Corey Comperatore who lost his life during the assassination attempt will also be present.

title: 'Joe Biden just big-timed Kamala Harris on national TV': MAGA supporters say big boost to Trump
content: President Biden made a surprise appearance at a White House briefing, potentially overshadowing Kamala Harris's campaign event. He emphasized their collaboration and her role in legislative successes. Conservatives suggested he might be undermining her campaign, while Biden reportedly felt sidelined recently. Biden privately complained to his allies that Harris and the Democratic Party appear to have "moved on from him" since his July exit from the 2024 race.
summary: President Biden made a surprise appearance at a White House briefing, potentially overshadowing Kamala Harris's campaign event. He emphasized their collaboration and her role in legislative successes. Conservatives suggested he might be undermining her campaign, while Biden reportedly felt sidelined recently. Biden privately complained to his allies that Harris and the Democratic Party appear to have "moved on from him" since his July exit from the 2024 race.

title: Cheryl Hines barely spoke to RFK Jr since Olivia Nuzzi episode broke: Report
content: Cheryl Hines is reportedly embarrassed by several cheating scandals involving her husband, RFK Jr. The controversies include a relationship with reporter Olivia Nuzzi and allegations from three other women associated with Children's Health Defense. Hines, currently in Europe, has shown signs of anger and is contemplating divorce, reports claimed but she has not issued any public statement yet.
summary: Cheryl Hines is reportedly embarrassed by several cheating scandals involving her husband, RFK Jr. The controversies include a relationship with reporter Olivia Nuzzi and allegations from three other women associated with Children's Health Defense. Hines, currently in Europe, has shown signs of anger and is contemplating divorce, reports claimed but she has not issued any public statement yet.

title: 'How does your mom do it': Kamala Harris on how she broke ice with her stepchildren
content: Speaking about her step-children Cole and Ella who call Kamala Harris Momala, ​Kamala said as she got to know Ella and Cole, she was conscious that they don't feel that they were being disloyal to their mother as they became close to her. "I knew that..so I used to ask them 'how does your mother do it...show me'," Kamala said.
summary: Speaking about her step-children Cole and Ella who call Kamala Harris Momala, ​Kamala said as she got to know Ella and Cole, she was conscious that they don't feel that they were being disloyal to their mother as they became close to her. "I knew that..so I used to ask them 'how does your mother do it...show me'," Kamala said.

title: Harry, Meghan will go separate ways but no, they are not splitting
content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are pursuing independent professional paths amid rumors of separation. Harry focuses on patronage work while Meghan is working on Hollywood and entrepreneurial projects. Despite these changes, insiders assert they remain a happy couple, not planning for divorce --though it has been reported that Harry did not spend the 40th birthday night with Meghan and instead went on a hiking tour with pals.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are pursuing independent professional paths amid rumors of separation. Harry focuses on patronage work while Meghan is working on Hollywood and entrepreneurial projects. Despite these changes, insiders assert they remain a happy couple, not planning for divorce --though it has been reported that Harry did not spend the 40th birthday night with Meghan and instead went on a hiking tour with pals.

title: Israel military official says 'preparing response' to Iran attack
content: on Saturday that the military is "preparing a response" to the Iranian missile barrage that targeted Israel earlier this week. "The IDF (Israeli military) is preparing a response to the unprecedented and unlawful Iranian attack on Israeli civilians and Israel," the military official said on condition of anonymity as he was not authorised to speak publicly on the issue.
summary: on Saturday that the military is "preparing a response" to the Iranian missile barrage that targeted Israel earlier this week. "The IDF (Israeli military) is preparing a response to the unprecedented and unlawful Iranian attack on Israeli civilians and Israel," the military official said on condition of anonymity as he was not authorised to speak publicly on the issue.

title: Romania infringed on transgender man's rights, EU's top court rules
content: Romanian authorities' refusal to recognise the gender identity of a British-Romanian transgender man violated his rights, the EU's top court ruled. Arian Mirzarafie-Ahi, who transitioned after gaining British citizenship, faced denial from Romania despite EU law mandating recognition without extra procedures. This ruling sets a significant precedent for transgender rights across the EU.
summary: Romanian authorities' refusal to recognise the gender identity of a British-Romanian transgender man violated his rights, the EU's top court ruled. Arian Mirzarafie-Ahi, who transitioned after gaining British citizenship, faced denial from Romania despite EU law mandating recognition without extra procedures. This ruling sets a significant precedent for transgender rights across the EU.

title: Two migrants dead, many injured after van crashes in Croatia
content: In central Croatia, an overloaded van with German numberplates carrying migrants crashed, resulting in two fatalities and several injuries after veering off the road. The passengers included citizens of Turkey and Middle Eastern countries. This incident follows another migrant transport accident in Croatia last month, highlighting the ongoing migrant crisis along the Balkan route.
summary: In central Croatia, an overloaded van with German numberplates carrying migrants crashed, resulting in two fatalities and several injuries after veering off the road. The passengers included citizens of Turkey and Middle Eastern countries. This incident follows another migrant transport accident in Croatia last month, highlighting the ongoing migrant crisis along the Balkan route.

title: 'Command centre used to plan attacks': Israel strikes Hezbollah fighters inside Lebanon mosque
content: The Israeli Defense Forces conducted targeted airstrikes on Hezbollah forces operating from a command center inside a mosque near Salah Ghandour Hospital in southern Lebanon. The strikes aimed to halt terrorist activities against Israel. Nine medical and nursing personnel were injured despite prior evacuation warnings.
summary: The Israeli Defense Forces conducted targeted airstrikes on Hezbollah forces operating from a command center inside a mosque near Salah Ghandour Hospital in southern Lebanon. The strikes aimed to halt terrorist activities against Israel. Nine medical and nursing personnel were injured despite prior evacuation warnings.

title: Antarctica turning green 'dramatically', trend accelerated over years, study finds
content: Antarctica's vegetation cover has grown significantly, increasing from less than a square kilometre to nearly 12 square kilometres between 1986 and 2021. The accelerated greening, driven by climate change and reduced sea-ice extent, highlights the rapid and concerning transformation of the Antarctic Peninsula's landscape, emphasizing the urgent need for further research and action to protect this vulnerable region.
summary: Antarctica's vegetation cover has grown significantly, increasing from less than a square kilometre to nearly 12 square kilometres between 1986 and 2021. The accelerated greening, driven by climate change and reduced sea-ice extent, highlights the rapid and concerning transformation of the Antarctic Peninsula's landscape, emphasizing the urgent need for further research and action to protect this vulnerable region.

title: Hezbollah says fires rockets at north Israel air base
'War needs to end': Kamala Harris meets Arab American leaders amid growing discontent over US support for Israel
content: VP Kamala Harris met Arab American and Muslim leaders in Michigan to address US support concerns for Israel. The session, important for her presidential campaign, saw community leaders expressing frustrations over the humanitarian crisis in Gaza. Harris emphasised peace efforts amidst criticism. The upcoming election underscores the significance of this demographic's support.
summary: VP Kamala Harris met Arab American and Muslim leaders in Michigan to address US support concerns for Israel. The session, important for her presidential campaign, saw community leaders expressing frustrations over the humanitarian crisis in Gaza. Harris emphasised peace efforts amidst criticism. The upcoming election underscores the significance of this demographic's support.

title: Elon Musk's X transfers $5.2 million in fines over Brazil ban to wrong bank account
content: Elon Musk’s platform X, banned by Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes over disinformation charges, mistakenly transferred $5.2 million in fines to the wrong account. Justice Moraes instructed the redirection of these funds. X, with 22 million Brazilian users, began blocking certain accounts and requested to lift the ban, which Moraes conditioned on paying pending fines.
summary: Elon Musk’s platform X, banned by Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes over disinformation charges, mistakenly transferred $5.2 million in fines to the wrong account. Justice Moraes instructed the redirection of these funds. X, with 22 million Brazilian users, began blocking certain accounts and requested to lift the ban, which Moraes conditioned on paying pending fines.
